snippet.title: Metro Quester: Osaka - Official Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay, creatures, and more in this trailer for Metro Quester: Osaka, an upcoming dungeon exploration RPG. Metro Quester: Osaka is based in a post-apocalyptic futuristic world created by the manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara, with a game system designed by Hironori Kato. 

Metro Quester: Osaka will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Windows devices, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), and Nintendo Switch on September 13, 2024.
